pagespeed.note: PageSpeed Insights API quota exceeded during analysis. Manual test recommended at https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis?url=https://carek9.com

mobile.notes: Shopify-hosted site with multiple CSS files loaded in head, large hero image (1500px wide), and multiple JS bundles. Likely LCP 2.5-4s on mobile.

desktop.notes: Desktop likely performs better. Shopify CDN handles caching well.

issues.issue: Title previously showed just 'CareK9' but now updated to 'CareK9 | Premium Natural Dog Treats, Food Toppers & Paw Care' (63 chars - slightly over 60 char ideal)
Meta description mentions 'grooming/bathing supplies and (soon to come) treats' - outdated copy, treats are now the main product
Duplicate meta description tags - Shopify default AND custom override both present in HTML
Duplicate meta description tags in HTML
Duplicate meta description tags in HTML
Duplicate meta description tags in HTML
Meta description too long (231 chars, should be 120-160)
Meta description too long (186 chars, should be 120-160)
og:image uses HTTP instead of HTTPS (http://carek9.com/cdn/...)
og:description uses outdated default text about 'grooming/bathing supplies'

pages.title: CareK9 | Premium Natural Dog Treats, Food Toppers & Paw Care
pages.description: Your dog's new favorite online shop! Shop simple, clean, and easy-to-use grooming/bathing supplies and (soon to come) treats.

pages.title: Shop All | CareK9
pages.description: Shop all CareK9 premium natural dog products — treats, food toppers, paw care & bath essentials. Made fresh to order with clean ingredients. Free shipping $50+.

pages.title: Dog Treats | CareK9
pages.description: Custom SEO description set via theme override

pages.title: Food Topper | CareK9
pages.description: Natural dog food toppers to boost nutrition & flavor...

pages.title: Paw Care | CareK9
pages.description: Natural dog paw care balms & treatments...

pages.title: Chicken Wrapped Pumpkin Dog Treats | High Protein Gut Health | CareK9
pages.description: Human-grade U.S. chicken & fresh Kabocha pumpkin. High protein, high fiber dog treats for sensitive stomachs. No preservatives or GMOs. Shop CareK9 quality.

pages.title: Beef Wrapped Pumpkin Dog Treats
pages.description: Beef wrapped pumpkin dog treats — chewable, air-dried, and gentle for any age or size dog...

pages.title: Functional Dog Food Topper - Digestive Support
pages.description: Whole-food probiotic topper with pumpkin, chicory & mushrooms for gut health...

pages.title: Paw Balm
pages.description: Protect your dog's paws with CareK9's Paw Balm/soother...

pages.title: Protein Chips
pages.description: Revitalize your pet with healthy Oxidog Chips™...

brokenLinks.note: Returns 503 - likely Shopify password/auth redirect, not a true broken link

images.summary: All homepage images have descriptive alt text. Lazy loading is properly implemented on below-fold images. Images use Shopify CDN with responsive srcset.

withAlt.alt: Three dogs - a terrier mix, poodle, and schnauzer - enjoying a walk
Chicken-Wrapped Pumpkin Super Healthy Dog Treats

oversized.note: Hero banner image serves up to 1500px wide - acceptable for full-width hero but could benefit from WebP format

images.lazyLoading: Properly implemented - below-fold images use loading='lazy'
images.responsiveImages: Good - srcset with multiple widths provided

robots.details: Well-configured robots.txt. Blocks admin/cart/checkout/account properly. Allows policy pages. AI crawler access enabled (GPTBot, ChatGPT-User, Anthropic-AI, etc.). Sitemap referenced.
robots.content: Disallow: /admin, /cart, /orders, /checkouts/, /checkout, /carts, /account, variant/sort/filter params, /search, /policies/ (with exceptions). Allow AI bots.

sitemap.issue: Sitemap URL in robots.txt is relative (/sitemap.xml) - should be absolute URL

canonicalTags.details: All pages have proper canonical URLs with hreflang alternates (en + x-default)

issues: BreadcrumbList has 'Translation missing: en.general.breadcrumbs.home' instead of 'Home' - translation key not resolved

pages.note: High word count includes inline JS/CSS in stripped HTML. Visible content ~300-500 words.
issues: No H1 tag on homepage - major SEO issue
Multiple H2s used for navigation/footer sections

pages.note: Includes JS/CSS. Visible product content likely 500-800 words.

pages.estimatedWordCount: Low - collection pages are product grid with minimal text content

recommendations.fix: Add a single H1 tag to the homepage with primary keyword, e.g., 'Premium Natural Dog Treats & Wellness Products'. Currently only H2s are used.
Update meta description from 'grooming/bathing supplies and (soon to come) treats' to reflect current product focus on treats, food toppers, and paw care. Should be 120-160 chars.

recommendations.issue: og:image tags use HTTP instead of HTTPS on product pages
recommendations.fix: Update Shopify theme to output og:image with https:// protocol. Currently outputs http://carek9.com/cdn/... which may cause social sharing preview failures.

recommendations.issue: No og:image on homepage or collection pages
recommendations.fix: Set og:image for homepage (brand image/hero) and each collection page (collection featured image). Critical for social media sharing and link previews.

recommendations.issue: Breadcrumb structured data has translation error
recommendations.fix: Fix 'Translation missing: en.general.breadcrumbs.home' in BreadcrumbList JSON-LD. Add the missing translation in Shopify theme locales.

recommendations.issue: Duplicate meta description tags on collection pages
recommendations.fix: Collection pages output TWO meta description tags (Shopify default + custom override). Remove the duplicate in the theme's collection template to avoid confusion for search engines.

recommendations.issue: Some product meta descriptions too long
recommendations.fix: Shorten meta descriptions for Beef Wrapped Pumpkin (231 chars) and Paw Balm (186 chars) to under 160 characters.

recommendations.issue: Some product titles too short for SEO
recommendations.fix: Expand thin titles: 'Paw Balm' (8 chars) and 'Protein Chips' (13 chars) should include brand + benefit keywords, e.g., 'Organic Paw Balm for Dogs | Cruelty-Free Moisturizer | CareK9'
Expand 'Dog Treats | CareK9' to include keywords like 'Natural Dog Treats - Human-Grade & Air-Dried | CareK9'. Aim for 50-60 chars.

recommendations.issue: og:description on collections uses outdated default text
recommendations.fix: Update og:description template in Shopify theme to use the collection-specific description instead of the global site description.

recommendations.issue: Sitemap URL in robots.txt is relative
Collection pages have very thin content
recommendations.fix: Add descriptive text (150-300 words) to collection pages explaining the product category, benefits, and use cases. Helps with keyword rankings.
Consider trimming to 60 chars for optimal SERP display, though 63 is acceptable.

recommendations.issue: Navigation link labeled 'Upload' for contact page
recommendations.fix: Consider renaming to 'Contact' or 'Contact Us' for better UX and SEO clarity.

recommendations.issue: Hero image is JPEG, not WebP
recommendations.fix: Shopify CDN may auto-serve WebP. Verify via browser DevTools. If not, consider uploading WebP versions for faster load times.
API quota was exceeded. Run manual tests at https://pagespeed.web.dev/ for homepage, /collections/all, and a product page to get Core Web Vitals data.
